biography: Marc Silk (sometimes wrongly credited as Mark Silk) is a British voice actor from Solihull, England.  His work includes appearances in Chicken Run and as the U.S. voice of Bob in Bob the Builder, the roles of Aks Moe in Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace, Johnny Bravo, Scooby Doo and commissions forDisney.
name: Marc Silk
